Blog.post: i am bored. so i am gonna post some pics of me. well enjoy.

well yesterday i was looking foward to hanging out wiht sal and bryant. but things didnt turn out the way i had expected.... i went to jessicas house around 3:15 and then we leave and go to walgreens. cause she wanted to get her pictures developed from the day before when she had went to finch. ha she got a pic with nate. her pictures turned out very good... im jealous. my pics from warped were horrible thats prob cause i was so far... and the camera sucked. so ya. then we call up adam and he says he's at jasons so we go there... but i guess jason and his dad went to get pool stuff cause their pool is green LOL. and they left adam to watch it. eh i dont really like jason he sorta creeps me out. but eh. jessica misses adam. so we just hang out on the porch... and tehn jason and his dad get back... and ya.. i dont know he's weird... and becky came. ha it sucked bry didnt know if he could hang out.. cause like his mom wasnt home -bummer- :( me and him have been wanting to hang out. eh. cause hes moving and not gonna be going to washington anymore it sucks. and we barely began to talk. and sal we were gonna call him up.. but werent sure if he would be home.. and we heard julie was with him and ya. dont like julie. and so her dad called her and wanted to see her and so we walk there cause it was a few blocks of where we were. so we walked through rowan park and we see michelle
well later on im gonna go hang out... with hopefully bry and sal. when sal gets off work.. and bry is able to come out. i cant wait to see em both..
well things are better now. with my digital.. my love .

well before this i had a different blog that i had signed up to but kinda of neglected so i made a new one. and im going to try it and see if i like it..... so for my first entry..... lemmme see today i got my ticket for TB today!!! WOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO! mannn that made my day!! i have been wanting to go for how long now? but i had thought i wasnt going until a couple of days ago. LOL! i wasnt sure if they would still have any tickets cause the show is on monday hahah i bought it so last minute. ha like what a couple of days before. ha. im sooo glad i am going. but bummed cause my camera isnt working.. my digital -cries- ... cause like this show is gonna be at the metro and i was planning on bringing my digital but i think last week my digital got affected by the power outage cause i go to transfer pics.. and it says their damaged. so ya. i think im gona take it to best buy tommorow and see if my love... is sick. :( welll im gonna end this first entry. farewell.

why does he have to leave? it was worse enough he was already moving and it was bad enough. but now going even farther.. going to philly! -cries- i wish he could stay here.. so we could get to know each other better.. i wish i couldve known him better and for a longer period of time.. but things dont turn out the way you plan... :-( ahh i wish we could at least hang out and i could say goodbye while he is still here... :-( why is his mom so mean. !!! GR.
i have nothing to say to you today lol, isnt that sad?????????? oh, but it is. 8) love, kayleigh

yeah i slept till 11 technically. but im still really asleep so oh well. but i cant do nothin today no pool, no movies, no nothin. so sad, oh so sad. im just gunna sit here all day and keep my gramps company. and clean, my favority thingie ever. >:/ golly , today will be boring, so email me im me w/e KEEP ME COMPANY !!!!!!! well, thats all for now... so ill catch ya if i can. (tee hee) love, Kayleigh

ok, so i was hangin wif sarah and we were in the parking lot of zion and riding in huge circles, fun fun . anywho, when we were leaving, here was a car coming, and i was going fast behind her. and i kept hitting her wheel and it freaked me out.then i tryed to avoid her wheel and i went up the curb on accident and fell off and like rolled and sat there with my legs crossed, laughing my little head off. and there was a ton of people waching and they were like oh no is she ok!!!! and im just laughing!!!!!!!!! hahaha anywho, my chain came off in two places, but we fixxed it and got that black crap all over our hands. it was realllly funny. i bet you couldnt do that, see, because im a square. and its hard to do that on porpuse. give it a try, and fill me in on how it works. like what parts on you started bleeding. hehehe well, im leavin c ya 8) love, kayleigh

1.don't not block your face. 2.hit them so hard they can't hit back. ok, your set your sure to win now. yeah, i had a major pillow and water fight wif sarah who i have now spent literally wo days with. fun fun!!!! well, im out to hang some more. luvins. (thats my word, i made it i started it. so nay to u!!!)

ahhhh i feel bad for my gramps. he was sleeping, and he was dreaming, and in his dream he was fightin somone, and he was standing up and swingin and everything, but he was asleep. but anyways, he fell, and hit his head on the door, and has like three huge gash thingies. he had to get 6 stitches. and he has cancer so most of his hair was gone, but they saved it all off. 8( 8( and this was at 5 o clock this mornin. there was blood all over the door and the carpet. pretty scary... but hes ok, really sore. i wanna know who he was fightin lol. but i think they one this battle. but winning a battle dosent mean you win the war. SO GO GETT EM' GRAMPS!!! lol, but i was worried. that silly goose. well, thats all for now. hes bald and bleeding, lol. oh, and my bro killed a racoon by punching it yesterday hahahaha. funny but very sad. thats it... lata love 8) kayleigh.

WHOOOOO HOOOOOOOO GUESS WHAT GUESS WHAT GUESS WHAT?!?!?!?!i had a dream that i was going out with harry potter lol. i mean sure i have a boyfriend, and i like him very much... but it was a dream and it was harry potter.I MEAN HARRY POTTER.i love this dream, i hope i h ave it again. lol i think im a little obsessed. hehehehe but who cares, its not like it would really happen, so i have to enjoy the dream. well, thats it for now... so i guess ill write somthin new lata. oh im so happy. love, kayleigh 8)

wow, i did nothing today, FASCINATING!!! lol, man... i dont feel good. i had some weird dreams last night, but i cant seem to remember lol... but for some reason... OH!!! has anyone heard of the movie called the fly??? it was made in the eighties. but anywho, i dreamed this guy got turned into a fly, and like stuck his finger down a gurls throat, and all off a sudden a bunch of really nasty lookin stuff burst out of her mouth, she started turnin into a thing like him. and the guy in that movie looked really nasty. and so did these people. man, why was i dreamin about a fly????? talk about weird. other than that i got a whole bunch of paper cuts on my tounge from sealing like 120 envelopes. but oh well. oh my golly, its august?!?!?!?!?! AUGUST?!?!?! wow, i just now looked at the date, august second??? thats crazy!! im slow lol. well, thats all for now. oh, and if you have any ideas of what sport i should play tell me, cuz im tryin to figure that out. love always, Kayleigh 8)
